briefdescription.para: Maps the GPIO pins to their desired function.

detaileddescription.para: This function once called will map the GPIO pins to their desired functions to drive the Temperature Sensor peripheral. It is needed to call this function prior to the BSP_Max31865_Enable().

parameterdescription.para: in the case of success or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Disables the control over the peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: in the case of success or an error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: This function disconnects the GPIO pins dedicated to the Temperature Sensor peripheral and put them into low power consumption state.

parameterdescription.para: in the case of success or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Enables the control over the peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: in the case of success or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Sets the configuration and enables the CS pin.

parameterdescription.para: in the case of success or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Returns the handle of the communication interfaces used by the peripheral.
Get the Status of the peripheral(Temp Sensor).

parameterdescription.para: isConnected: To get the Max31865 Sensor connected status, if the sensor connected it's true otherwise false.

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK in the case of success or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Sets the Max31865 chip select pin to logic level high.

parameterdescription.para: in the case of success or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Sets the Max31865 chip select pin to logic level low.

parameterdescription.para: in the case of success or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Implementation of Max31865 Interface BSP functions.
